function.name: wallet_register
function.description: Register a wallet via EIP-191 signature. Free.

address.description: Ethereum address to register (0x... 42 chars, checksummed).

signature.description: EIP-191 signature over "Register <address> with prim.sh at <timestamp>".

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp used in the signed message. Must be within 5 minutes of server time.

function.name: wallet_list
function.description: List registered wallets owned by the calling wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_get
function.description: Get full wallet details including balance, policy, and status. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_deactivate
function.description: Permanently deactivate a wallet. Irreversible. Pending fund requests cancelled. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_create
function.description: Request USDC funding for a wallet. A human operator can approve or deny. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

amount.description: Requested USDC amount as a decimal string (e.g. "10.00").

reason.description: Human-readable reason for the funding request.

function.name: wallet_fund_request_list
function.description: List all fund requests for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_approve
function.description: Approve a pending fund request. Returns the address to send USDC to. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_deny
function.description: Deny a pending fund request. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_policy_get
function.description: Get the spending policy for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_policy_update
function.description: Update spending policy for a wallet. All fields optional. Pass null to remove a limit. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

maxPerTx.description: Max USDC per transaction. Pass null to remove the limit.

maxPerDay.description: Max USDC per day. Pass null to remove the limit.

allowedPrimitives.description: Allowed primitive hostnames. Pass null to allow all.

function.name: wallet_pause
function.description: Pause operations for a wallet. Temporarily halts spending without deactivating. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_resume
function.description: Resume operations for a paused wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: faucet_usdc
function.description: Dispense 10 test USDC on Base Sepolia. Rate limit: once per 2 hours per address. Free.

address.description: EVM wallet address to drip to (0x... 42 chars).

function.name: faucet_eth
function.description: Dispense 0.01 test ETH on Base Sepolia. Rate limit: once per 1 hour per address. Free.

address.description: EVM wallet address to drip to (0x... 42 chars).

function.name: faucet_status
function.description: Check rate limit status for a wallet address across both faucets. Free.

function.name: faucet_get_treasury_status
function.description: Check treasury wallet ETH balance and refill status. Free.

function.name: faucet_refill_treasury
function.description: Batch-claim testnet ETH from Coinbase CDP faucet into treasury. Rate limited to once per 10 minutes. Free.

function.name: store_bucket_create
function.description: Create a new storage bucket. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Bucket name. Unique per wallet. 3-63 chars, alphanumeric + hyphens.

location.description: Storage region (e.g. "us-east-1"). Defaults to primary region.

function.name: store_bucket_list
function.description: List all buckets owned by the calling wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_bucket_get
function.description: Get details for a single bucket. Caller must own the bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_bucket_delete
function.description: Delete a bucket. Bucket must be empty first. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_put
function.description: Upload an object. Key may include slashes. Content-Length header required. Request body is raw bytes. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_get
function.description: Download an object. Response body is streamed directly. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_delete
function.description: Delete an object from a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_list
function.description: List objects in a bucket. Cursor-based pagination. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_get
function.description: Get quota and usage for a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_set
function.description: Set the storage quota for a bucket. Pass null to reset to default (100 MB). Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

quota_bytes.description: New quota in bytes. Pass null to reset to default (100 MB).

function.name: store_quota_reconcile
function.description: Recompute bucket usage by scanning actual R2 storage. Use when usage_bytes appears incorrect. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: search_web
function.description: Search the web and return ranked results with optional AI-generated answer. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. 1-20, default 10.

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 country code to bias results (e.g. "US").

include_answer.description: Include AI-generated answer summarizing top results. Default false.

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only (e.g. ["docs.base.org"]).

function.name: search_news
function.description: Search for recent news articles, ordered by recency. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. 1-20, default 10.

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 country code to bias results (e.g. "US").

include_answer.description: Include AI-generated answer summarizing top results. Default false.

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only (e.g. ["docs.base.org"]).

function.name: search_extract_url
function.description: Extract readable content from one or more URLs as markdown or plain text. Failed extractions are in the failed array. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

urls.description: URL string or array of URLs to extract content from.

function.name: spawn_server_create
function.description: Provision a new VPS. Returns immediately with status 'initializing'. Poll GET /v1/servers/:id until status is 'running' to get IP address. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

type.description: Server type slug. Only "small" (2 vCPU, 4 GB RAM) available in beta.

ssh_keys.description: SSH key IDs from POST /v1/ssh-keys to install on the server.

user_data.description: Cloud-init script to run on first boot.

function.name: spawn_server_list
function.description: List all servers owned by the calling wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_get
function.description: Get full details for a single server. Poll this until status='running'. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_delete
function.description: Destroy a server and release its resources. Unused deposit is refunded. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_start
function.description: Start a stopped server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_stop
function.description: Stop a running server (graceful shutdown). Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_reboot
function.description: Reboot a running server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_resize
function.description: Change server type (CPU/RAM). Server must be stopped first. Deposit adjusted. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

upgrade_disk.description: Upgrade disk along with CPU/RAM. Irreversible if true. Default false.

function.name: spawn_server_rebuild
function.description: Reinstall from a fresh OS image. All data on server is destroyed. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

image.description: OS image slug to rebuild with (e.g. "debian-12").

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_create
function.description: Register a public SSH key. Returned ID can be used in ssh_keys when creating a server. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Human-readable label for this SSH key.

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_list
function.description: List all SSH keys registered by the calling wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_delete
function.description: Remove an SSH key. Keys in use by active servers remain until server is rebuilt. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_create
function.description: Create a mailbox. Optional: username, domain, ttl_ms. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

username.description: Desired username. Omit for random generation.

domain.description: Domain for the mailbox (must be registered). Omit for default domain.

ttl_ms.description: TTL in milliseconds. Omit for permanent mailbox.

function.name: email_mailbox_list
function.description: List mailboxes owned by the calling wallet (paginated). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_get
function.description: Get mailbox metadata including expires_at. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_delete
function.description: Permanently delete a mailbox and all messages. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_renew
function.description: Extend mailbox TTL by ttl_ms milliseconds. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

ttl_ms.description: Extension duration in milliseconds. Omit to apply default TTL.

function.name: email_messages_list
function.description: List messages in a mailbox, newest first. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_message_get
function.description: Get full message including textBody and htmlBody. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_send
function.description: Send email from a mailbox. Requires to, subject, and body or html. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

body.description: Plain-text body. Either body or html is required.

html.description: HTML body. Either body or html is required.

function.name: email_webhook_create
function.description: Register a webhook URL for message.received events. Optional secret for HMAC signing. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

url.description: HTTPS URL to receive webhook POST requests.

events.description: Events to subscribe to. Defaults to ["message.received"].

function.name: email_webhook_list
function.description: List webhooks for a mailbox. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_webhook_delete
function.description: Delete a webhook. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_register
function.description: Register a custom domain. Returns required_records for DNS. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_list
function.description: List registered custom domains (paginated). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_get
function.description: Get domain details and verification status. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_delete
function.description: Remove a custom domain registration. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_verify
function.description: Verify DNS records. On success: status → verified, dkim_records returned. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_deploy
function.description: Deploy a new ERC-20 token. Returns immediately with deployStatus: 'pending'. Poll GET /v1/tokens/:id until deployStatus is 'confirmed' before minting or pooling. Price: $1.00 via x402 (USDC on Base).

initialSupply.description: Initial supply as a raw integer string (e.g. "1000000000000000000" = 1 token at 18 decimals).

mintable.description: Whether additional tokens can be minted after deployment. Default false.

maxSupply.description: Maximum mintable supply as a raw integer string. Null = unlimited. Only applies if mintable is true.

function.name: token_list
function.description: List tokens deployed by the authenticated wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_get
function.description: Get token details: deployStatus, contractAddress, supply, pool. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_mint
function.description: Mint additional tokens to an address. Requires mintable=true at deploy time. Price: $0.10 via x402 (USDC on Base).

to.description: Recipient address to mint tokens to.

amount.description: Amount to mint as a raw integer string.

function.name: token_supply
function.description: Live on-chain total supply from contract. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_pool_create
function.description: Create and initialize a Uniswap V3 pool paired with USDC. One pool per token. Price: $0.50 via x402 (USDC on Base).

pricePerToken.description: Initial price per token in USDC as a decimal string (e.g. "0.001").

function.name: token_pool_get
function.description: Get pool details: poolAddress, token0, token1, fee, sqrtPriceX96, tick. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_pool_liquidity_params
function.description: Get calldata for adding liquidity. Returns approvals[] and position manager params. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

tokenAmount.description: Raw token amount to add as liquidity

usdcAmount.description: Raw USDC amount to pair (6 decimals)

function.name: mem_collection_create
function.description: Create a vector collection. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

distance.description: Distance metric for similarity search. Default "Cosine".

dimension.description: Vector dimension. Must match the embedding model used. Default 1536.

function.name: mem_collection_list
function.description: List collections owned by the calling wallet (paginated). document_count is null — use GET :id. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_collection_get
function.description: Get collection with live document_count from Qdrant. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_collection_delete
function.description: Delete collection and all documents. Irreversible. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_upsert
function.description: Embed and store documents. Each document: {id?, text, metadata?}. Existing IDs are replaced. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

documents.description: Documents to upsert. Existing IDs are overwritten.

function.name: mem_query
function.description: Semantic search. Fields: text (required), top_k, filter (Qdrant native format). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

text.description: Query text to embed and search against.

top_k.description: Number of nearest neighbors to return. Default 10.

function.name: mem_cache_put
function.description: Store a value in the KV cache. Optional ttl in seconds for expiry. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

value.description: Value to store. Any JSON-serializable value.

ttl.description: TTL in seconds. Omit or null for permanent.

function.name: mem_cache_get
function.description: Retrieve a cache value. Returns 404 if missing or expired. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_cache_delete
function.description: Delete a cache entry. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_search
function.description: Check availability and pricing for a domain query. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

query.description: Domain name or keyword to search

function.name: domain_quote
function.description: Get a 15-minute price quote for a domain. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

years.description: Number of years to register. Default 1.

function.name: domain_status
function.description: Full post-registration pipeline status (ns_propagated, zone_active, all_ready). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_create
function.description: Create a Cloudflare DNS zone. Returns nameservers to set at your registrar. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

domain.description: Domain name to create a zone for (e.g. "example.com").

function.name: domain_zone_list
function.description: List DNS zones owned by the calling wallet (paginated). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_get
function.description: Get zone details. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_delete
function.description: Delete zone and all records. Irreversible. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_activate
function.description: Request Cloudflare NS re-check for faster activation. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_verify
function.description: Check DNS propagation for all zone records. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_mail_setup
function.description: Configure MX, SPF, DMARC, DKIM in one call. Idempotent. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

mail_server_ip.description: Mail server IPv4 address (used for SPF record).

dkim.description: DKIM keys to configure. Provide rsa and/or ed25519.

function.name: domain_record_batch
function.description: Create, update, and delete DNS records in one atomic request. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_create
function.description: Create a DNS record (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV, CAA, NS). Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

priority.description: Priority for MX and SRV records.

function.name: domain_record_list
function.description: List all records in a DNS zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_get
function.description: Get a single DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_update
function.description: Update a DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

priority.description: Priority for MX and SRV records.

function.name: domain_record_delete
function.description: Delete a DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: track_track_package
function.description: Track a package by tracking number and carrier. Returns status, ETA, and full event history. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_chat
function.description: Chat completion. Supports streaming, tool use, structured output. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_embed
function.description: Generate embeddings for text input. Returns vector array. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_list_models
function.description: List available models with pricing and capabilities. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_scaffold
function.description: Generate a complete prim package from a prim.yaml spec. Returns file manifest with contents. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_validate
function.description: Validate a prim.yaml spec against the schema without generating files. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_schema
function.description: Return the prim.yaml JSON schema for agents to reference when writing specs. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_ports
function.description: Return allocated ports and next available port number. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).
